page.shortlink: ux control properties radiobutton properties orientation
page.description: Are the radio buttons laid out vertically, horizontally, or in columns? If in columns, you can specify the 'snaking' style; Left-to-Right-Top-to-Bottom (LRTB), or Top-to-Bottom-Left-to-Right (TBLR). Columns are not supported for 'ButtonList' style.
